marklogic.body: Wait, so every black person wears their pants around their ankles, sells and partakes in drugs, kills other black people, and is racist? are you thick, dimwitted or just mentally challenged? The kid in question wasn't a child like anything you described and yet he was gunned down in Cold blood, explain that? oh yeah because of people like you and like zimmerman think every black person, no matter how they Act are like what you described. its the separation of the black community, the "i am better than impoverished blacks" the " i have arrived" negro, Who make comments like you have just made, that make other ethnicities believe it is OK to belittle, ostracize, disrespect, and apparently murder the black race. wake up!Â
